InstructionData.Title: Composter
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
define MINQTY 3 define MINH20 20 alias Composter d0 alias GasSensor d1 alias Vent d2 alias LiquidSensor d3
alias pressure r0 alias venton r1 alias quantity r2 alias activate r3 #alias xhasitems r4 alias h20mols r5 #alias xcomposton r6 #alias xhasbiomass r7 alias haswater r7 alias temp1 r14 alias temp2 r15
s Vent Mode 1 s LiquidSensor On 1 loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure sgt venton pressure 5 s Vent On venton
l temp1 LiquidSensor TotalMoles l temp2 LiquidSensor RatioWater mul h20mols temp2 temp1 sge haswater h20mols MINH20 #s db Setting haswater s Composter On haswater beq haswater 0 done l quantity Composter Quantity blt quantity MINQTY done #beq hasbiomass 0 done l activate Composter Activate beq activate 1 done #blt quantity MINQTY done s Composter Activate 1 done: j loop
